priorVersion.title: CDISC Clinical Classification NSAA Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C132517

self.title: CDISC Clinical Classification NSAA Test Code Terminology

definition: North Star Ambulatory Assessment test code.
name: North Star Ambulatory Assessment Clinical Classification Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Clinical Classification NSAA Test Code Terminology
synonyms: North Star Ambulatory Assessment Clinical Classification Test Code

terms.definition: North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you stand up tall for me for as long as you can and as still as you can.
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you walk from A to B (state to and where from) for me.
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Stand up from the chair keeping your arms folded if you can.
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you stand on your right leg for as long as you can?
terms.preferredTerm: NSAA - Stand on One Leg - Right

terms.definition: North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you stand on your left leg for as long as you can?
terms.preferredTerm: NSAA - Stand on One Leg - Left

terms.definition: North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you step onto the top of the box using your right leg first?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you step onto the top of the box using your left leg first?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you step down from the box using your right leg first?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you step down from the box using your left leg first?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you get from lying to sitting?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Get up from the floor using as little support as possible and as fast as you can (from supine).
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Time to get up from the floor using as little support as possible and as fast as you can (from supine) (seconds).
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Lift your head to look at your toes keeping your arms folded.
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you stand on your heels?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - How high can you jump?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you hop on your right leg?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Can you hop on your left leg?
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Run as fast as you can to...(give point).
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Time to run as fast as you can (seconds).
North Star Ambulatory Assessment - Total.
